properties.title: Cabane de Valsorey CAS
properties.abstract: Take with you a gas cooker when no hut attendant
properties.description: Located at the southern foot of Grand Combin in Val dâ€™Entremont, the cabin offers an unobstructed view of the Montblanc range. The simple, rustic and cosy cabin is a popular stopover on the winter Haute Route. In summer there are climbing routes to ascend the Combin summits. In winter steep couloirs await very experienced skiers. Close to the cabin there is a climbing park with various sectors. Mountain hikers are enthused by the panorama high route from the cabin northwards.
